snippet: After leaving “The Walking Dead” following a dispute with the show’s network, Frank Darabont is returning to television with “Mob City,” which includes the “Walking Dead” co-star Jon Bernthal.
abstract: Screenwriter and showrunner Frank Darabont, who left The Walking Dead after dispute with program’s network, is returning to television with his latest show Mob City; crime series, which features Walking Dead co-star Jon Bernthal, will debut on TNT.
lead_paragraph: After leaving “The Walking Dead” following a dispute with the show’s network, Frank Darabont is returning to television with “Mob City,” which includes the “Walking Dead” co-star Jon Bernthal.

headline.seo: Frank Darabont Prepares ‘Mob City’ for TNT
headline.main: Zombies in His Past, Now Onto Cops
headline.print_headline: Zombies in His Past, Now Onto Cops
